about_the_game:
Story
A red moon shines ominously on a city shrouded in endless night. The people here don't seem to have any life left in them. Well, all except for him. A young woman looking for an escape from her dreary everyday latches onto the only man left with light in his eyes, and musters up the courage to confess her love. If only she had noticed his sharp teeth before it was too late...

Features
  • Around 9k words (30-45 minute playtime)
  • One possibly unhinged vampire love interest
  • 5 different endings, plus one unlockable final ending
  • 3 CGs (with variations)

Content warnings
This game features possibly disturbing content including blood, violence, manipulation, death/murder and dubious consent.

content_descriptors.notes: This game features possibly disturbing content including visual, non-graphic depictions of blood and textual (non-graphic) depictions of violence, manipulation, drugging, death/murder and dubiously consensual kissing and bloodsucking.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: MacOS
  • Processor: 1Ghz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL compatible card
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

name: Duskbound

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Win XP+
  • Processor: 1Ghz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX or OpenGL compatible card
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

short_description: Pursue a cursed romance with a possibly unhinged vampire under the eternal glow of the red moonlight...
